Rulings.Edison:
●If Hayabusa Knight's first attack is negated with Magic Cylinder, it may still attack one more time.
●If Kuriboh's effect is activated during Hayabusa Knight's first attack, when it attacks again Kuriboh's effect is not applied.
Rulings.Tengu:
●If Hayabusa Knight's first attack is negated with Magic Cylinder, it may still attack one more time.
●If Kuriboh's effect is activated during Hayabusa Knight's first attack, when it attacks again Kuriboh's effect is not applied.

Rulings.Base: 1. If the first attack of "Hayabusa Knight" is negated with "Magic Cylinder", it may still attack one more time.\n2. If the effect of "Kuriboh" is activated during the first attack of "Hayabusa Knight", when it attacks again the effect of "Kuriboh" is not applied.
